certificate.title: Showcase your skills with certificate
certificate.description: Demonstrate your expertise and dedication with a professional certificate. Proudly display your achievements and boost your career with proof of your skills and knowledge in UX/UI design.

banner.title: About the program
banner.description: This program focuses on Front-End development, emphasizing user interface (UI) programming and JavaScript programming language. JavaScript is indispensable for creating dynamic and interactive websites and is also widely used in other fields, such as server-side and mobile application development. During the training, you will gain theoretical knowledge and practical skills necessary for building functional and modern websites. You will master the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, learn to create responsive design pages, and make them accessible. You will work with advanced frameworks like React and Next.js. Additionally, you will explore artificial intelligence (AI) solutions that can optimise workflows and enhance productivity. The final project is a fully functional website that is hosted online, developed together with a team using Jira and GitHub. It will serve as evidence of your capabilities.

modules.title: Foundations of Digital Design
modules.description: Learn the essential principles of digital design, from typography and layout to color theory and visual hierarchy. Master Figma and explore the complete design process to build visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.

modules.title: Crafting Seamless Experiences
modules.description: Discover how to create intuitive and accessible user experiences by understanding user personas and accessibility best practices. Learn to build interfaces that feel natural and effortless for users.

modules.title: Designing Visual Languages
modules.description: Develop your skills in visual storytelling by mastering UI design systems, color schemes, and consistent visual languages. Learn how to create cohesive and modern digital products.

modules.title: From Concept to Creation
modules.description: Turn your design ideas into reality with practical projects and AI-driven design tools. Develop prototypes and bring your concepts to life using cutting-edge technology. Implement the design together with our Programming course students.

expectations.title: What to expect after course?
expectations.description: You know the fundamentals of UX/UI design, can create interactive prototypes, and have a certificate to prove your skills.

cards.title: Flexibility
cards.description: Work from home or Seychelles? No problem

mentor.title: Meet your mentor
mentor.name: Gedas Gardauskas
mentor.role: Co-founder | Software engineer and Frontend mentor
mentor.description: Gedas is a co-founder of Unicamp and an experienced programmer with over 7 years of experience in the IT field. His areas of expertise include MLOps, GCP infrastructure, Node.js, React.js, and other technologies. Gedas has experience in developing text-to-speech (TTS) systems, managing AI model deployment processes, data warehouses, data processing systems, learning platforms, and BI tools. He created highly regarded JavaScript and Python programming programs used by CodeAcademy and FastTrack academies.

prices.title: One-time
prices.description: Pay full price and don’t worry about next payments.

prices.title: Financial aid
prices.description: Apply for financial aid and have opportunity to lear for free.
